thread.title: Beautiful Hotel -
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mulhimaam
title: Beautiful Hotel -
text: The hotel gave us very big room, which is unusual in New York. Also, the bed was very comfortable and was a king size. I enjoyed the free Wi-Fi in the room. The room itself was very quiet; we stayed on the 10th floor and didn't hear any noise at all. The best part is the location of the hotel which is in the center of times square and all main attractions and subways are very close to the hotel.
